SvcInfoRespCoverageDetail.name: SvcInfoRespCoverageDetail
SvcInfoRespCoverageDetail.description: Represents additional coverage details about a service information response.

AdditionalInformation.description: The additional information for the detail added to the service information response coverage.

DetailCodeId.description: The code representing the detail added to the service information response coverage.

DetailType.description: The type of detail added to the service information response coverage.

DetailValue.description: The value of the detail type when the detail type is Assertion Identifier.

DetailValueDataType.description: The data type of the detail value.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

ServiceInfoResponseCoverageId.description: The service information response coverage that the additional details are captured for.
